showScoreExcerpt:
"'In Transit' is a fun, feel good musical. And that's about it...Even with redundant and predictable plot lines, they still managed to bring a smile...The score featured some great songs. But even with a cast of 11, there were moments when Deke Sharonâ€™s arrangements felt thin...Marshall did all she could to make 'In Transit' more than a fluffy musical comedy. Trying to find the weight in the material never quite happened so Marshall opted for gimmicks. And they worked, some of the time."
